BadgeDetail.Name: Brakes I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This abadge demonstrates the earner is capable of assessing drum and disc brakes for wear, replacing pads, inspecting for hydraulic leaks, bleeding brakes and can replace a hose.

Task.Title: Drum and pads
Task.Body: Upload evidence assessing drum and disc brakes for wear and then replacing pads.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence assessing drum and disc brakes for wear and then replacing pads.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence *assessing drum and disc brakes* for wear and then *replacing pads*.

Task.Title: Hydraulics
Task.Body: Upload evidence for bleeding brakes, inspecting for hydraulic leaks and replacing a hose.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence for bleeding brakes, inspecting for hydraulic leaks and replacing a hose.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence for *bleeding brakes*, *inspecting for hydraulic leaks* and *replacing a hose*.
